Citizens lack accessible insights into how their actions impact the environment. Local authorities and communities struggle to measure sustainability efforts effectively. There’s a need for a transparent, data-driven platform that encourages eco-friendly behavior.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.proposed_solution: EcoTrack is a web-based sustainability dashboard that helps users and communities track their environmental footprint in real time. The platform integrates with open environmental APIs and IoT devices to provide live data on air quality, carbon output, waste management, and energy consumption. It gamifies sustainability by rewarding eco-friendly actions and sharing community progress.
